description:
This course will teach you how to get free flights for your next holiday, by using the 80:20 method of airline & credit card reward systems.

It will cover:

  • An introduction to the points system
  • The 80:20 method
  • What the different rewards are
  • Where to get the points
  • How to effectively use your points

You do not need any prior knowledge of points systems to complete this course, it assumes the student is completely new to this.

It does however, cover information that most are unaware of. If you do have an understanding of the points system, this course will further develop that knowledge.

This course breaks down the reward system to a simple and easy to understand model. As a result you will be able to complete the course quickly. 

The 80:20 method allows you to do 20% of the work, that gets you 80% of the reward. This course is designed to eliminate activities that take up large amounts of time and instead focuses on the activities that can be automated, so that you move closer to free flights while you sleep!

You should take this course if you love to travel, want to reduce your overall holiday spend so that you can have better and more frequent holidays! 

All you need to start is an awesome destination in mind. 

What are you waiting for? 

Buy the course and get those flights now!
title: Travel Hacking: The 80:20 to Free Flights
